content: spider cat toy crochet pattern pdf spooky squishy and totally claw-some this spider cat toy is the purr-fect halloween treat for your feline friend it s a quick make using beginner-friendly stitches a tiny bit of stuffing and our soft chenille yarn for extra playtime fun whether your cat is a little trickster or just loves a good bat-around toy this creepy-cute spider is sure to get their paws moving details skill level beginner size 6 x 6 inches skills required magic_ring alternative single_crochet increase decrease chain slip_stitch materials & tools chenille yarn included in both supplies and yarn options crochet hook included in supplies option stitch marker included in supplies option small amount of stuffing included in supplies option scissors not included yarn details yarn weight super bulky fiber content 100% polyester hook size 5 5 mm colors used phantom black marshmallow fluff white this little spider may be small but it s packed with playful personality make one for your pet or stitch up a few as festive halloween gifts for fellow cat lovers
